inclusion.criterion: Literacy: The subject must be able to read, comprehend, and record information in English.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Type of subject: The subject must be seen in the outpatient setting.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Respiratory Instability: Hospitalization for respiratory disease within the last 6 months during study period and prior to Visit 0.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior Treatment of Asthma: Treatment for asthma with any medication (except for short acting inhaled bronchodilators) for 12 months or more prior to Visit 0
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
